Summary Note:
The Relationship Manager (RM) first met Schwarz Schneider Graf at a charity gala in Vienna. They had a long conversation about their mutual interest in philanthropy and decided to stay in touch.
Having worked for over 26 years, Schwarz Schneider Graf brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
After extensive research, he chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Schwarz Schneider Graf is currently divorced. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
Schwarz finished secondary school at Bundesgymnasium und Bundesrealgymnasium Leoben in 1993.
Schwarz completed his university education at Salzburg University of Applied Sciences in 1998.
Occupation History:
Schwarz Schneider Graf is a 50 year old and comes from Austria.
In 1999, Schwarz Schneider Graf started working as a Software Developer at Cisco Systems Austria GmbH, marking the beginning of his successful career.
His subsequent role was as a Startup Founder at Ubitricity GesmbH, where he continued to grow professionally from 2003 to 2008.
From 2009 to 2011, he served as a CEO at Cisco Systems Austria GmbH, solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
He worked as a Venture Capitalist at SAP Austria GmbH from 2013 to 2016, playing a pivotal role in shaping the company's vision and strategy.
He has been a Tech Industry Leader at Microsoft Austria GmbH since 2017, consistently demonstrating his ability to adapt, innovate, and thrive in an ever-changing environment.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 300000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He owns flat in Krems an der Donau, where he resides. It is worth 900000 EUR.


In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 280000 EUR from his late mother, a renowned Venture Capitalist, in 2015.
Client Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting him in achieving his financial goals.
